step1.title: Eli's Adventure Begins
step1.description: Eli stood in front of the big, green valley. The light that everyone talked about was shining in the distance, and Eli wanted to find it. Eli’s mom had said, “God will always show you the way, just trust Him.” But there were many paths in the valley, and Eli wasn’t sure which one to take.

step2.title: The Rocky Path
step2.description: Eli chooses the rocky path. It’s tough but rewarding.
